body.name: Sensyne 60" Phone Tripod & Selfie Stick, Lightweight All in One Phone Tripod Integrated with Wireless Remote Compatible with All Cell Phones for Selfie/Video Recording/Photo/Live Stream/Vlog（Black）

features: 【All in 1 Innovation Design】Sensyne 60" all-rounder phone tripod is a great invention, integration of selfie stick and tripod. The tripod is super handy to capture moments for family or individual without having to bother other people. It collapses down to a perfect size (13.5 in) just like a relay baton and takes minimum space in your backpack. Especially for a solo content creator, that's a great addition.

【60" Solid Telescoping Pole】Adoption of premium aluminum alloy material, high-end piano baking paint process, top notch quality. The extendable pole is composed of 6 sections. At fully extension, 60" length allows the tripod to stand at eye level to take portrait shots. In addition, the long extension arm is also great for aerial view. It is sturdy and tall enough to get some wonderful shots at will.

【360° Rotating Phone Holder】This tripod is easy to maneuver into position and convenient for you to adjust your cellphone, vertically or horizontally. It allows you to find the best angle you need, suitable for all smartphones 4"-7" in width. Moreover, the phone holder is well wrapped with non-slip silicone pads to protect your mobile phone better.

【Multifunctional Selfie Stick Tripod】This phone tripod stand is foldable, portable and easily free to switch between selfie stick mode and tripod stand mode. It is available for indoor or outdoor activities. Being your professional photographer, widely applicable to video recording, group photos, vlogging, adventuring, family pictures, face time, online meeting, ect.

【Removable Bluetooth Remote Shutter】The wireless bluetooth remote shutter is the icing on the cake. In case of being lost, the remote trigger is embedded into selfie stick tripod's leg. It can pair seamlessly with your smartphone with ios or android system and allow you to capture beautiful pictures or shoot videos from the distances at random.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT - sturdy, portable, functional
reviews.reviewText: This item is great! Perfect for traveling. Packs up super compact for your bag, fits into a beverage slot in a backpack too which is handy. Opens up easily. Holds the phone well, feels sturdy. Love that it comes with a remote to pair with it ... makes it all nice and easy. And it is not super heavy, but also not super light ... it has just enough weight to it so it feels steady and wont get knocked over by a little breeze.Love this little gadget ... i will 100% buy again if this one ever lets me down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS! Super handy
reviews.reviewText: This is for me the perfect tool. I absolutely love it.I am not a selfie-stick guy but I have wanted a good portable tripod for a long time. This offers so much flexibility it's really impressive. The length is short enough that I can fit it into my travel sling but long enough that it is able to stand up securely. The legs flip out with a pull-apart action at the bottom of it. The top pulls up off the end and has forward and back tilting options which work great both in the selfie-stick and tripod configuration.The remote is quick and responsive and bluetooth-pairing it was quick and easy. I have used it many times and have yet to recharge it.if you're someone who has large family gatherings where everyone says let's take a picture together at the end and it takes you an hour to get everyone situated, YOU NEED THIS THING!! It gave everyone a focal point, made it easy to take the pics and adjust without folks getting up and down.I actually made this a little easier because I have a pixel watch that has an app on it to view what my phone is seeing. I am therefore able to zoom in/out and adjust it after sitting down to make sure I can see everyone and then take the picture either from the remote or my watch. I used both because I don't want to look at my watch in the picture and can quickly snap a bunch of pics by pressing the trigger instead. If you don't need time to go sit down you really don't need a delay timer so it makes everything that much faster.Going outdoors as long as your ground is fairly flat I think it should be fine. I have not tried it in rocky terrain yet but will next month and update this if it changes. So far this is the best of these i have tried and far cheaper than some of its competitors which frankly don't do all the things this one does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Tripod for Influencers on the Go!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this tripod, and it’s been a game-changer for my Zoom calls and social media filming. The compact design makes it super convenient for anyone.The adjustable height is a lifesaver – no more awkward camera angles. Setting it up is a breeze, and the stability is top-notch, ensuring my content comes out looking professional every time.What sets this tripod apart is its compatibility with smartphones and cameras. The universal phone holder securely grips my device, and the swivel head allows for easy adjustments. Perfect for capturing those impromptu moments during virtual meetings or creating engaging content for my followers.I love the durability – it feels sturdy and well-made, which is crucial for someone always on the move. Plus, it folds down to a compact size, fitting seamlessly into my influencer bag. Trust me, it’s a must-have in your content creation toolkit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well. Holds phone securely, no matter which orientation. Tripod is sturdy enough, but I wouldn't trust being on pavement on a windy day.Very compact, portable and easy to set up. Best of all, we don't have to take turns taking group photos!I will report with android phones, if you have the volume button set for zoom or volume control, the remote will not work correctly. Simply go into your settings, then shooting methods and make sure the volume buttons are set to take a picture.To be honest, I didn't know that I needed a tripod/selfie stick until I bought this one. Now, we take it on every excursion.Overall, I'm very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is SO convenient. It has the remote to take pictures through blue tooth. It opens and closes smoothly. The price is just right for what it is. It has no problem standing . I’ve used it in hikes and it’s super light and compact. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 perfect for solo content creation
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This tripod came bundled with a light from the same brand and I couldn’t of made a better purchase. The tripod is lightweight, good quality and easy to travel with, it folds with in itself so it makes storage and travel easy and you don’t have to mess around with the leg clips like other tripods have. It is tall in height, I am almost 5’8” and it comes up to my face. It has a bluetooth remote so it makes filming and taking photos so easy, especially if you’re by yourself and the remote already comes installed with a watch battery so you’ll need to replace it when the time comes. This tripod is everything I could ask for and more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and useful
reviews.reviewText: I was amazed at how compact the phone tripod is when closed. I found it quite easy to open and easy to use. When set up the tripod is sturdy and easy to adjust. I would recommend this tripod without reservation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Accessory for Travel and Group Shots
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews here before purchasing this tripod and they were mostly positive. Since we're all using phone cameras these days, I wanted a tripod that is specifically made for holding phones as versus cameras. We used it to get group pictures on both Christmas and later on a holiday visit with additional family. It was so easy to set up with a sturdy tripod and firmly held iPhone. Love, love the remote - what a treat not to set a timer and have someone run to their position for the shot. I'm planning on taking this on my next vacation. It's light, but sturdy, and will be easy to pack and carry. Great product!

The length is appropriate, excellent design, excellent remote control and over all excellent quality product for money. The clamper is of good quality and rotates at almost every angle. Recommended!! 👍

The media could not be loaded. Me gustó porque es ligero, práctico y discreto para llevar a cualquier lado, tiene buena estabilidad al extenderlo completamente y sirve muy bien para usarlo como mini tripié sobre la mesa y poder grabar de esta forma; otro punto me gustó es que como bastón al extenderlo todo tiene buena visión de alcancé. Lo único no me agradó es que no gira 360° dónde va empotrado el teléfono, al igual que la pinza dónde se sujeta siento le falta presión para sujetar, pero acomodando bien el celular no se mueve ni corre riesgo de caída, ya lo puse a prueba, siento que si mejorarán este punto sería el tripié perfecto. El mini control trae para tomar fotos a distancia enlaza rápido a bluetooth, lo malo es que este usa pila de boton, igual sería perfecto si fuese de carga USB. Hasta ahora me ha funcionado bien, no tengo queja, los materiales se sienten bien aunque como todo hay que usarlo adecuadamente y con calma para no dañarlo.

I needed something to record my daughters volleyball games but sturdy enough not to vibrate when the ball bounces near it or knocks over easily and this product delivered! It's compact and easy to carry. Easy to set up. Sturdy while recording! Affordable price
Very handy, compact . Good quality, sturdy. Tricky to open tripod stand but once you know, life is easy. Happy with the purchase.
I absolutely love this tripod, well made easy to use. Lightweight as well
